item.title: It’s year three, why are we still having Covid feelings? Could it be we have unresolved grief? | First Dog on the Moon
item.description:
Grief is EXHAUSTING so give yourself a break. Or if you can’t do that leave me alone I am tired

  • Sign up here to get an email whenever First Dog cartoons are published
  • Get all your needs met at the First Dog shop if what you need is First Dog merchandise and prints

item.title: Crufts, clubbers and Ed Sheeran: Modern Toss pick their favourite cartoons
